message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $200.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for value. How about we meet in the middle at $175?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
